author: inphi
content:
Nil optional fields that precede non-nil fields need to be included in the rlp encoding. Otherwise, the decoder cannot know which fields to skip as that info isn't in the codec.

This shouldn't be a problem post-fork because the "optional" capella and 4844 headers must be included anyways. So I'm not sure this is a bug per se, just a known limitation with using rlp for optional fields.
